metadata.title: CVE-2023-3424 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 10.3 before 15.11.10, all versions starting from 16.0 before16.0.6, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.1. A Regular ExpressionDenial of Service was possible via sending crafted payloads to thepreview_markdown endpoint.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
